logo.add: SET IDENTITY_INSERT [Logo] ON INSERT INTO [Logo] ([ID],[Logo],[HierarchyId],[UpdateUser],[UpdateTime]) VALUES(1,Convert(varbinary,''),1,'Auto',GETDATE()) SET IDENTITY_INSERT [Logo] OFF
